summary: This document consists of administrative records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9, 2019, including inmate count sheets, rosters, and out-count forms. The records show inmate assignments, unit counts, and operational categories, with one inmate listed in a suicide watch/hospital assignment.

persons.name: Davila
persons.context: Listed as inmate REG NO 76256-054 in the hospital/suicide watch assignment on the inmate roster dated August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Santana
persons.context: Listed as inmate REG NO 48816-066 in an unassigned suicide watch assignment on the inmate roster dated August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Harrison
persons.context: Listed as inmate REG NO 57084-056 assigned as a 'TEN DRIVER' on the inmate roster dated August 9, 2019.

events.title: Daily Prison Administrative Counts and Rosters
events.description: Routine administrative activities at the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, including inmate counts by housing unit and assignment updates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is dated August 9, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
Inmate rosters show at least two inmates (Davila and Santana) were on suicide watch/hospital assignment status.
The documents are routine administrative prison records (count sheets, rosters, out-count forms) from the facility where Epstein was held.
